## Example of SVG Output

This is an example of SVG output from a Julia code block.

```{julia}
#| label: fig-parametric
#| fig-cap: "Parametric Plots"

using LaTeXStrings
default(
    fontfamily="serif-roman",
    guidefontsize=28,
    tickfontsize=20,
    legendfontsize=20,
    margin=5Plots.mm,
)

    x -> sin(2x),

    2Ï€,

    fill=(0, :lavender))

```
